nhc_headline: ...TINY OSCAR A LITTLE STRONGER... ...TURKS AND CAICOS ISLANDS SHOULD BRACE FOR HURRICANE CONDITIONS TONIGHT...
summary:
...TINY OSCAR A LITTLE STRONGER... ...TURKS AND CAICOS ISLANDS SHOULD BRACE FOR HURRICANE CONDITIONS TONIGHT...
 As of 5:00 PM EDT Sat Oct 19
 the center of Oscar was located near 21.4, -71.1
 with movement W at 10 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 987 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 85 mph.
